edu.ucla.sspace.text

Interface Stemmer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EnglishStemmer, GermanStemmer, ItalianStemmer, PorterStemmer, SnowballPorterStemmer

    public interface Stemmer
    An interface for classes that stem tokens.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String stem(String token)
      Converts the token to its root form, or if it is already in root form, returns the token.

    • Method Detail

      • stem

        String stem(String token)
        Converts the token to its root form, or if it is already in root form, returns the token.
